text: Let me preface this question by saying I use TextMate on Mac OSX for my text needs and I am in love with it.
Anything comparable on the Linux platform?
I'll mostly use it for coding python/ruby.
Doing a google search yielded outdated answers.
Edit:  Since there has been some concern about the 'merit' of this question.
I am about to start a new Ruby Programming Project in Linux and before I got started I wanted to make sure I had the right tools to do the job.
Edit #2:  I use VIM on a daily basis -- all .
I was just looking for some alternatives.
